match.title: 6th Match
match.statusText: Sri Lanka won by 9 wickets (with 85 balls remaining)

image.longCaption: Black clouds hang over Banghabandhu nation stadium in Dhaka as the pitch is covered with plastic 20 April 2003. South African and India are to play the final match of the TVS tri-nation cricket tournament, but heavy rain stopped the match before it could start

milestones.description: Athar Ali Khan and Akram Khan's 20-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 6th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 7 between Minhajul Abedin and Zahid Razzak
Aminul Islam and Golam Faruq's 46-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 8th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 14 between Hafizur Rahman and Golam Faruq
Harunur Rashid has broken the record for most ducks (2) in ODIs for BAN, going past Aminul Islam's 1
Azhar Hossain has become the top wicket-taker for BAN in ODIs with 3 wickets, going past Gazi Ashraf's 2
This is the lowest match aggregate (238) involving teams Sri Lanka & Bangladesh in ODIs
Gazi Ashraf has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (5) for BAN, going past Gholam Nousher
Aminul Islam and Golam Faruq's 46-run partnership is BAN's highest for any wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 43 between Minhajul Abedin and Shaheedur Rahman
